data.message: Hi my girlfriend's has been hacked and he has changed both e-mail and telephone number so she cannot login in at all. Also when we follow your guidlines you only send the recover code to the hackers telephone number or e-mail. We have literally tried everything! Please help us

replies.message: Hey Joacim. If your girlfriend can't get into her account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell her to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2xC1RQd to get immediate help. You can also encourage her to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2g55EPM for tips and guides to help keep her account secure. -Kiara

Facebook Hi Kiara, Thanks for the quick respons. We have tried going through everything on the hacked accounts section. However, when we do this the code to restore or freeze the account is sent to the hackers e mail account, thus making it impossible for us to take any further action. Can you please provide any guidelines? Atleast so that we can freeze the account. Best regards, Joacim
